org.apache.hadoop.ha

Class ClientBaseWithFixes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zookeeper.ZKTestCase
      • org.apache.hadoop.ha.ClientBaseWithFixes
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestActiveStandbyElectorRealZK, TestZKFailoverController, TestZKFailoverControllerStress

    public abstract class ClientBaseWithFixes
extends org.apache.zookeeper.ZKTestCase
    Copy-paste of ClientBase from ZooKeeper, but without any of the JMXEnv verification. There seems to be a bug ZOOKEEPER-1438 which causes spurious failures in the JMXEnv verification when we run these tests with the upstream ClientBase.

      protected class  ClientBaseWithFixes.NullWatcher
      In general don't use this.
